Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hi there! How can I assist you today? If you have any questions or need help with something specific, feel free to let me know!
Is it possible to setup an account spending limit?
Yes, you can set up an account spending limit. This helps you control your expenses and stay within your budget. If you need detailed instructions on how to set this up, please let me know!

To set up an account spending limit, follow these steps:
1. Log in to your account on the News Break platform.
2. Navigate to the 'Account Settings' section.
3. Look for the 'Spending Limit' option and click on it.
4. Enter your desired spending limit amount and save the changes.
If you need more detailed guidance, you can refer to our Account Management Guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
I cant seem to find the account settings section. Can you point whats near it?

Sure! The 'Account Settings' section is usually located in the main menu of your News Break account. Hereâ€™s how you can find it:
1. Log in to your News Break account.
2. Click on your profile picture or username at the top right corner of the page.
3. A dropdown menu will appear, and you should see 'Account Settings' listed there.
If you still have trouble finding it, please let me know!
What about prepay accounts. How can I do that

To set up a prepay account, follow these steps:
1. Log in to your News Break account.
2. Navigate to the 'Account Settings' section by clicking on your profile picture or username at the top right corner and selecting 'Account Settings' from the dropdown menu.
3. Look for the 'Prepay Account' option and click on it.
4. Follow the instructions to add funds to your prepay account and complete the setup.
If you need more detailed guidance, you can refer to our Account Management Guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.

Message: Hi Matt, apologies for delayed response. How can I help?
Hi, Iwas just wondering if it was possible to add a spending limit per ad account?
I was just wondering if it was possible to add a spending limit per ad account?
Hi Matt, unfortunately we do not have spending limit her ad account. However, our system is set up so that you can set spending limit per campaign.
